duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, form, administer, and close-out small to medium-sized subcontracts for service and construction projects.
Assist project team personnel in the planning, bid evaluation, and administration of subcontracts when necessary.
Develop bid tabulations, bidder recommendations, and negotiate post-award changes with subcontractor personnel.
Maintain relationships with subcontractors and resolve specific project problems related to subcontract performance.
Prepare periodic status reports for management and client personnel.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Procurement, or related field (Master's preferred)
